analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS Status: 39 (Defensive). Momentum pushed the score to 39, signaling a risk-off shift. DXY (Dollar/Liquidity) rose as VIX (Fear) spiked 15%, reflecting anxiety. Weak housing adds pressure. Warning: Stable credit spreads suggest a liquidity flush rather than a total collapse. Action: Reduce risk exposure immediately.

reports.EN: GMS Status: 39 (Defensive). Momentum pushed the score to 39, signaling a risk-off shift. DXY (Dollar/Liquidity) rose as VIX (Fear) spiked 15%, reflecting anxiety. Weak housing adds pressure. Warning: Stable credit spreads suggest a liquidity flush rather than a total collapse. Action: Reduce risk exposure immediately.

reports.ID: Status GMS: 39 (Defensif). Momentum mendorong skor ke 39, menandakan peralihan risk-off. DXY (Likuiditas) menguat sementara VIX (Ketakutan) melonjak 15%, mencerminkan volatilitas tinggi. Krisis perumahan menambah beban. Peringatan: Spread kredit stabil menunjukkan ini hanya penyesuaian likuiditas sementara. Tindakan: Kurangi eksposur risiko.
